298579565746718624.title: ActionProposal_Config_Refactor
298579565746718624.initial_mission: Refactor ActionProposalEngine config loading. TASKS: 1. Modify `simulation/decisions/action_proposal.py` to inject `ConfigManager` in `__init__` and replace hardcoded goods list with `self.config_manager.get('simulation.consumables')`. 2. Update `simulation/initialization/initializer.py` to pass `config_manager` to `ActionProposalEngine`. 3. Update `config/simulation.yaml` to add `consumables: ['basic_food', 'luxury_food']` (Correcting 'food' to 'basic_food'). 4. Create `tests/simulation/test_action_proposal.py` to verify config loading with a mock ConfigManager. REFERENCE: implementation_plan.md.
